Suriname Coast Protect Area Management MSP

iati-activity.title: Coastal Protected Areaa
iati-activity.description: The project goal is to safeguard Suriname’s globally significant coastal biodiversity. The project objective is to promote the conservation of biodiversity through improved management of protected areas along the nation’s western coast.

iati-activity.title: Feasibility Bio-fuel Production from Arundo donax
iati-activity.description: Feasibility Study for commercial Production of Bio-fuels from Arundo donax in mined out areas around Moengo in the Republic of Suriname.

iati-activity.title: Feasibility Bio-fuel Productio
iati-activity.description: The primary goal of the feasibility study, which is supported by pilot scale activities, is to establish the agronomic and techno-economic viability of Arundo donax plantations within the mined-out areas of the Moengo region.
